titles.title: Volunteer Firefighter Recruitment and Retention Act of 2008
Volunteer Firefighter Recruitment and Retention Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit against tax for volunteer firefighters.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Volunteer Firefighter Recruitment and Retention Act of 2008- Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow volunteer firefighters with eight or more years of service a $1,500 tax credit ($1,000 for three or more years).
